title: Platform Engineering Reshapes Software Dev at Bechtle
author: Todd R Weiss
description: German IT services and consulting vendor, Bechtle AVS, has adopted platform engineering to better serve its internal developers and its customers around the world with better code and development tools.
cntitle: 贝克特平台工程重塑软件开发
cndescription: 德国 IT 服务和咨询供应商 Bechtle AVS 采用平台工程，以更好地为其内部开发人员及其全球客户提供更好的代码和开发工具。
